Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23901 affecting package re2c for versions less than 3.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-23901 affecting package re2c for versions less than 3.1-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package re2c is earlier than 3.1-4, affected by CVE-2022-23901
